alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Decatur; Grady; Lanier; Lowndes; Seminole; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 01 at 5:01PM EDT until April 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 106 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA HOLMES JACKSON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA DECATUR GRADY SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADEL, AUSMAC, BAINBRIDGE, BANNOCKBURN, BARKER STORE, BARNEYVILLE, BEACHTON, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAPEL, COBB CROSSROADS, COOK CO A/P, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, ELPINO, EMPRESS, FAIRCHILD, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LYNN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MASSEE, METCALF, MONCRIEF, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, NEW HOPE, PASCO, PINE PARK, PINE VALLEY, QUITMAN, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SPENCE AIRPORT, STEINHAM STORE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WEBER, AND WEST BAINBRIDGE.
